objective.i_want: to select from multiple AI artistic styles and preview transformations
objective.so_that: I can choose the perfect style for my art print

acceptance_criteria.description: Display 8+ style options (watercolor, line art, oil painting, pop art, romantic, comic, vintage, original)
Each style shows name in Hebrew with appropriate icon
Selected style has purple border highlight
Live preview generated via Gemini/Nano Banana API
Loading overlay with spinner during AI processing
Style badge shows 'popular' or 'new' where applicable
Error handling with retry option for failed transformations

stop_conditions: Exposes API keys or Gemini credentials in client code
Makes unauthorized API calls to Nano Banana
Removes rate limiting on AI transformations
